resources.string: SHAREit is an easy and convenient way for users to share content such as photos, videos, music, contacts, etc.

It is the responsibility of the user to ensure that he or she has the right to share such content. Users should be familiar with the license terms applicable to any application or other data acquired from a third party before sharing. Lenovo shall not be liable for any consequences of the improper sharing of any content by a user. Before you start to share, please ensure you have the right to share with other users.
Open 5G-hotspot mode, transfer faster than faster
Share files with friends nearby for free download.(only Android phones supported)
Click here to search friends nearby with files shared
Click here to share my files to friends nearby
Sharing services started, waiting for friends to request for connection
Clone everything from old device to new device.
One-key import of apps, contacts, photos, etc. between devices.
Click here to import the apps, contacts, pictures, etc. from the Sender.
Click here to export the apps, contacts, pictures, etc. into the Receiver.
"ZIP data found, and loading Please wait, when the data is large …"
"Default SD card: %1$s used, %2$s available. External SD card: %3$s used, %4$s available."
The other is exporting app data
The other is failed to export %s
Insufficient storage space, please clear up
App package error, please install manually
App memory error, please install manually
Library file missing, please install manually
Auto installation failed, please install manually
Apps with the same version as those available locally
Return to the Quick Select mode?

"%s apps not installed, quit and continue the installation from the home page.
Stop?"
Select the files to be shared
Confirm when receiving a request for connection
%s Sender(s) found, please click icon(s) to select corresponding phones
Tip: If you need to clean up this phone data to prevent loss of privacy, select [System Settings], restore factory settings
Click icons to select corresponding data
(If the import data applications can not run, please remove the application data)
Multimedia file save to the same path as the Sender
System Settings includes Network Configurations, Browser Bookmark, Wallpaper and Calendar
Enter into the Select mode(Select single file and app data)
How do I import data into new phone from old phone?
How to process the repeated data?
Where are the new data after cloning?
Whether the personal profile is secure?
"What's the app data imported when cloning?"
After installation of \"SHAREit\" on both phones, respectively click \"Sender\" and \"Receiver\".

"The existing data on the Receiver won't be downloaded repeatedly. Once the imported contacts, SMS, etc. exceed the upper limit of phone memory, the system will merge the data on the two phones, and then save the latest data."

"1. After cloning, contacts, SMS, personal profile, etc. will be automatically saved to the Receiver.For example, contacts will be saved to the Contact List. 2. Photos, music, videos, etc. will be saved to the same directory as the Sender, and can be played after scanning by corresponding player software."
If the phone has the ROOT permission, the system will automatically install and import/export all data. Please feel free to set permission.
"CLONEit is a utility not requiring network connection, so the personal profile won't be saved to any network."
"It adopts the wireless AP transmission, instead of cabled data network, so it won't consume any data traffic."

"The app data imported when completing the clone refers to the apps and games saved on the host, such as account, preferential settings, game coins, game progress, etc.Don't worry about forgetting account or losing game progress."
Select the data to be imported
"Please confirm on the old phone: Open\"SHAREit\", enter into \"CLONEit\" Select \"Sender\""
OK, start using the new phone
Cancel the import and return to the main app?
Import from the old phone(with zero traffic)
Old phone only supports Android system
Install SHAREit on the old phone
Install SHAREit on old phone by scanning
"Also, you can download from http://kc.lenovo.com/ or from other stores, such as http://app.lenovo.com/"
"Open CLONEit on old phone, Click CLONEit, and select 'Sender'"
SHAREit not installed on old phone?
Migrated later, start using new phone
Say goodbye to the old phone, contacts, text messages, photos, applications %1$s
Click \"CLONEit\" on the bottom of the home page,
Wait to be found by Sender
After completed, wait for the other to backup
Connect the device, and select the desired data
The %s needs to do the following
"Now SHAREit will help you to %s~ High-speed, zero-traffic, convenient"
CLONEit running in the background, please exit CLONEit first.

"Detected you may be root user, grant root privileges to SHAREit, can be quickly installed applications, app data and WLAN migration。
Request root privileges to SHAREit …"
"- Please manually install application. - App data, WLAN migration will be disabled."
Dear, SHAREit will use WLAN, Hotspot, Bluetooth, Contacts, SMS, Dialer records, Calendar, and etc. Would you agree?
2. Turn on WLAN, WLAN hotspot and Bluetooth.
3. Read and modify contacts, call log and SMS.
Agree to join the user experience plan to help improving the software, which needs to connect internet.
Turning off mobile data to prevent unauthorized data usage…
SHAREit does not have permissions to turn off mobile data. Turn off mobile data manually to prevent unauthorized data usage.
Give yourself an avatar and nickname!
Not selected, please click to select
Hi! I recommend SHAREit: a super-fast way to transfer files without consuming network traffic,——one song in one second: %s
Hi! I recommend SHAREit: a super-fast way to transfer files without consuming network traffic,——one song in one second: %s I am using it, too :) @SHAREit
Select a method to invite friends to install this app.
Bluetooth and zero traffic unavailable for inviting Apple clients~
This file type is not supported
Your permission is needed for others to connect with you
Display hidden files when selecting contents
Enable speedy zero-traffic SHAREit(trial version, which remains somewhat volatile)
Protect your network from unauthorized access when receiving
"\"ON\" means connecting the receiver's hotspot network, \"OFF\" means connecting the same LAN if possible"
\"ON\" means the receiver creates hotspot automatically, \"OFF\" means using the same LAN
Note: the history will be cleared automatically after specify the storage location
"You needn't specify if you have only one storage card"
No more than 140 words, please make it brief and clear

"Comments and suggestions are always welcome, and we will improve the product experience based on your feedback.You can also join SHAREit's official QQ group(251410749), and we will respond to your feedback in the group.Thank you for supporting SHAREit~"
Please leave your contact info. If your comments are highly valued, you will receive a mysterious gift from SHAREit~
Receiver unable to receive this file format
"Sending on Apple products requires joining the hotspot "
When using the same WLAN with friends, turn off the hotspot. Sure?
Just join the same WLAN with friends
"Or, click and join the sender's network which has been scanned"
Enter into System Settings->Network Settings, select and join network: %s
"LAN connection available! Cancel the hotspot priority from Settings when receiving"
"Wi-Fi Direct available! Cancel the hotspot priority from Settings when receiving"
File receiving unfinished, confirm to quit?
Are you sure to stop receiving?
Preparing for data transmission, please wait…
Invite friends to install this app
"Unable to connect! Please confirm the receiver is ready"
Can not do scanning in airplane mode.
Sending this content type is not supported
New version(zero-traffic) found from the connected phone
Quit SHAREit by pressing the BACK button again
"Hotspot are now ready. Tell your friend to connect to this wireless network:"
The special transmission mode has been stopped!
More suitable for Apple products and XP Operating System
Do you know? Your friends need to open SHAREit and click \"Receive\"～
This mode is more suitable for connecting Apple/XP devices
"Click the receiver's photo, and start to send"
"Friends still not found, which device they're using?"
Please connect your computer and phone to the same WLAN.
Connect Apple devices by this way at next time~
Connect non-hotspot Android by this way at next time
On Android 6.0 or above, SHAREit should open GPS to scan devices, please open GPS manually

Scan the QR code above, and download!

Please select after connecting to friends~

Speedy and convenient short-distance zero-traffic data transmission

"\"ON\" means connecting the receiver's hotspot network, \"OFF\" means connecting the same WIFI if possible"
\"ON\" means the receiver creates hotspot automatically, \"OFF\" means using the same WIFI
When using the same WIFI with friends, turn off the hotspot. Sure?

Please connect your computer and phone to the same WIFI.
